meanings.definition: To have in or be able to bring to one's mind an awareness of (someone or something from the past)
meanings.sent1: She remembers her grandmother's warm smile.
meanings.sent2: He remembers his childhood home fondly.
meanings.sent3: The old cat remembers where the sunny spot is.
meanings.sent4: The tree remembers the touch of the wind through its leaves.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the flowers makes her remember the garden.

meanings.sent1: He remembers the lyrics to his favorite song.
meanings.sent2: She remembers the taste of the delicious cake.
meanings.sent3: The computer remembers all the passwords for him.
meanings.sent4: The bookshelf remembers the stories of each book it holds.
meanings.sent5: The photograph helps her remember the happy moment.

meanings.definition: To keep in mind for attention or consideration
meanings.sent1: Remember to bring an umbrella in case it rains.
meanings.sent2: He remembers to call his friend on her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The note on the fridge helps him remember to buy milk.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock remembers to wake you up every morning.
meanings.sent5: She always remembers to say thank you for the help.
